update.releaseNotes: Version 1.6.1.0 release. Changelog: - Sign on/off now supports multiple team names - Added a silence mode. This will allow you to mute the alarm whilst already on the job. It'll save you from having multiple alarms triggering from SMS's about the same job. - Settings has moved location. It's now located on the app bar at the top. If you're struggling to update the app automaticly, please use this link http://bit.ly/sarcall-alarm
